tmp_sorry.message: Due to the latest changes of duels UI, this extension is not working properly. I will fix it. Please wait for a while.

options_description.message: Notify you in various ways when the duel is matched.

options_description_notes.message: Note that this extension does not work with secret/incognito/private windows.

options_settings_description.message: If you want to enable desktop notifications, make sure you have enabled notifications from your browser in your OS settings.

options_tips_description.message: You can quickly change settings by pinning the extension.

options_notes_note_one.message: This extension monitors the title of the tab/window at intervals of a few seconds. It considers the change of the title to a specific string as the start of a duel, so if the title tag is changed by other scripts or extensions, it may not work properly

options_notes_note_two.message: If you are playing duels on multiple tabs at the same time, it may not work properly

desktop_notification_description.message: The duel has been matched. It will begin soon.

voice_notification_message.message: Attention please. The duel will begin shortly.

settings_checkbox_window_to_foreground.message: Bring the window to the foreground

settings_checkbox_auto_disable.message: Automatically disable Notifier when the duel is matched (for one-time use)
